results.title: Concepts in science: chemistry
results.creator_credit: David Chamberlain, Ontario Educational Communications Authority and Television Ontario
results.brief_description: This excellent series of videos deals with key topics in the teaching of chemistry. Each tape is divided into short episodes of ten minutes duration with concise information and excellent graphics.
results.creator_credit_for_label: David Chamberlain, Ontario Educational Communications Authority and Television Ontario

results.title: Concepts in science: biology
results.creator_credit: David Chamberlain, Ontario Educational Communications Authority and Television Ontario
results.brief_description: This series looks at a range of topics associated with the study of biology. Clear animated diagrams, and concise format, (each episode on each topic runs for ten minutes), makes this an ideal teaching tool.

results.title: Con motto
results.brief_description: A policeman on point duty ‘conducts’ the traffic of a big city. Activity gets faster and faster as people go about their everyday life. Everybody enjoys the fantasy until the authorities arrive, reprimand the policeman and restore normality. Music only - no commentary.
results.description: A policeman on point duty ‘conducts’ the traffic of a big city. Activity gets faster and faster as people go about their everyday life. Everybody enjoys the fantasy until the authorities arrive, reprimand the policeman and restore normality. Music only - no commentary.

results.title: Comradeship
results.creator_credit: G Pabst, Aubert Film, Franco-Film, Gaumont and Nero-Film
results.brief_description: The dramatic story of a mining disaster shortly after World War I on the French-German border. Post war tension and bitterness are put aside when the German miners help rescue their French comrades. Emphasising worker solidarity. In German and French with English subtitles.
results.creator_credit_for_label: G Pabst, Aubert Film, Franco-Film, Gaumont and Nero-Film
results.description: The dramatic story of a mining disaster shortly after World War I on the French-German border. Post war tension and bitterness are put aside when the German miners help rescue their French comrades. Emphasising worker solidarity. In German and French with English subtitles.
